text: Days of Glory is a 1944 American World War II romantic drama movie directed by Jacques Tourneur and starring Tamara Toumanova, Gregory Peck, Alan Reed, Maria Palmer, Lowell Gilmore, Hugo Haas, Glen Vernon. It was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1945. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1944 romantic drama movies Category:1944 war movies Category:American war movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies directed by Jacques Tourneur
title: Days of Glory (1944 movie)
